attributes.action: for go the ministers pay rise for the sake of the ederly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: judging by the governments poor performance over the last few years and all ready high salary and exspense account they do not deserve a rise  .The money should go to the ederly who are poorly catered for . i have not had a rise for years and if i had performend as they have i would have been fired . without a payoff .
